cmp: 句 ((a measure word, for sentences or lines of verse)/sentence)
mng: to capture, to restrain, to constrain, to adhere rigidly to, inflexible

exm.mng: a stickler for formalities, rigidly adhering to sth, constrained, ill at ease
to restrict, to restrain, constrained, awkward, ill at ease, uncomfortable, reticent
constraint, to detain, to take into custody
to detain (a prisoner), to keep sb in custody
free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered, unbuttoned, without care or worries
not stick to, not confine oneself to, whatever
